name: Wanderjahr
description: Wanderjahr is a JRPG with real time combat and an intriguing story. “This universe, this reality, there’s a source code behind all of it. We’d know, we already found it.” “And with it, we will cleanse this reality of all evil.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Celeron 1.7GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 1 GB available space
